document.description: Hotel + Air + Car Reservation; Air Itinerary; Car ... Take 22nd Street Exit and turn right at end of exit, go 3 blocks, and turn right on Park Place.

At A Glance Hotel Details Maps&Directions Rooms&Suites Plan An Event Special Offers Dining Things To Do
At A Glance
national historic landmark in the heart of Birmingham.
Experience traditional southern elegance with up-to-date convenience in the heart of downtown Birmingham at the Hampton Inn and Suites Birmingham-Downtown-Tutwiler. The Tutwiler has hosted dignitaries visiting Birmingham since 1914. Start your tour of Birmingham with an audio-tour of the lobby’s historic photographs. The elegant lobby greets guests with original marble and decorative ceilings. Birmingham’s banking and legal offices are steps from the hotel. Explore Birmingham’s culinary scene from four-star restaurants to the popular Southern meal known as“meat and three.”Century Restaurant and Lounge located in the hotel lobby serves southern and gourmet classics. Tour the Civil Rights Institute and the Sixteenth Street Baptist Church, a central landmark of the Civil Rights movement. See sweeping views of the city from ten-acre Vulcan Park which features the world’s largest cast iron statue. Visit the McWane Science Center, a four-story interactive museum with IMAX theater.
Your tour of historic Birmingham continues in your elegant guestroom or suite. Room signs feature iconic images of Magic City. Artwork was chosen from the archives of the Birmingham Public Library. Unwind in a spacious guestroom appointed with 32-inch LCD flat-screen TV with City Vision and cable. Finish a presentation at the work desk or convenient lap desk. Reserve a one-bedroom suite with amenities such as a fireplace or balcony overlooking downtown Birmingham.
About The Hotel
